subject: Question regarding import charges on my order
description_text:
Hello,


I am writing to follow up on my previous message, as I have not yet
received a reply.

Order N’ SSN4600

I recently had to pay 41.82 € in import charges requested by UPS, as the
order was shipped from China. At the time of purchase, I understood that
the product would be shipped from a European warehouse, and I was not aware
that additional customs charges could apply.

For this reason, I would kindly like to ask:
- why the order was shipped from outside the EU, and
- whether it is possible to receive a refund or compensation for the import
charges I had to pay.

I paid these fees only to avoid delays with the delivery, Since it was a
Christmas gift as anticipated in the old email, and I would really
appreciate your clarification on this matter.

Thank you very much for your time and support.
I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Samuele

conversations.body_text: Hi Samuele Sommariva,    Please don't worry. After completing payment, provide the UPS invoice and we will reimburse you for a portion of the cost.

Hello,


thank you for your reply, I really appreciate it.


I have already completed the payment to UPS.

Please find the UPS invoice attached for reference.


Could you please let me know which portion of the 41.82 € import charges
will be reimbursed and how the reimbursement will be processed?


Thank you very much for your support.

I look forward to your confirmation.


Kind regards.



Il giorno gio 8 gen 2026 alle 11:03 service@simsonn.com
Hi Samuele Sommariva,    We have refunded you 20 euros as compensation.

Hello,

thank you again for the refund, I really appreciate it.

I just wanted to ask if it would be possible to also cover the remaining
UPS brokerage fee of 17.50 €, as it was applied due to the shipment coming
from outside the EU.

In any case, thank you for your support.



Il giorno gio 8 gen 2026 alle 11:30 service@simsonn.com
